block.circube.andesite_light.tooltip.beh: Emit _light_, suppress _monster spawn_ based on _Kinetic Impact_
block.circube.andesite_light.tooltip.sum: More than a lamp, there is _soul power_ inside
block.circube.brass_light.tooltip.behavi: Emit _light_, suppress _monster spawn_ based on _Kinetic Impact_
block.circube.brass_light.tooltip.summar: More than a lamp, there is _soul power_ inside
circube.ponder.spring.text_2: Spring use more stress when charging
circube.ponder.spring.text_3: Spring will continue to generate stresses after losing external stresses
circube.ponder.spring.text_4: Spring depletes internal stresses according to the stress impact, even if there are no other loads, and it depletes stresses itself
circube.ponder.spring_signal.text_1: Spring emits different redstone signals in different situations
item.circube.eight_sided_die.tooltip.beh: Roll a dice of _1-8_ points. Multiple dices can be rolled at once
item.circube.four_sided_die.tooltip.beha: Roll a dice of _1-4_ points. Multiple dices can be rolled at once
item.circube.six_sided_die.tooltip.behav: Roll a dice of _1-6_ points. Multiple dices can be rolled at once
item.circube.stabilizer.tooltip.behaviou: _Crush_ Stabilizer, teleport you to _unlocked_ Mechanical Beacons or _other players_
item.circube.stabilizer.tooltip.summary: Stabilizer is a consumable that needs to be used for teleportation
item.circube.ten_sided_die.tooltip.behav: Roll a dice of _1-10_ points. Multiple dices can be rolled at once
item.circube.twelve_sided_die.tooltip.be: Roll a dice of _1-12_ points. Multiple dices can be rolled at once
item.circube.twenty_sided_die.tooltip.be: Roll a dice of _1-20_ points. Multiple dices can be rolled at once
